attributes.additional_details:
Say no to the new RSA law.
Could every modified car enthusiast please share and sign this petition please. If you appreciate modified cars or are a dedicated owner please sign and share.
It's to say no to the new RSA law Banning modified and classic cars. It could come into effect on the 23rd march.
We all have to take action to show the government we will not stand for this.

Bryan

LowNLoud
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2199311/Millions-modified-classic-cars-banned-roads-meddling-European-Union-try-shake-MOT-rules.html
